pkg.name: indicator-dot
pkg.title: Indicator dot
pkg.description: Indicator dots are small, decorative, badge-like indicators used to call attention to an item, such as an unread message.

relatedComponents.name: tags
relatedComponents.title: Tags
relatedComponents.description: Tags classify content using keywords or labels. They are added to a web page, asset or content to help users search for related content quickly and easily.
